original_body_lines: The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation (Ceypetco) has revised fuel prices, effective from midnight today.
Under the new price revision, Lanka Petrol 92 Octane will now be sold at Rs. 348 per litre, showing an increase of Rs. 20 from the previous rate.
Conversely, Lanka Petrol 95 Octane Euro 4 has seen an increase of Rs. 10 per litre, bringing the new price to Rs. 375.

Ceypetco has also adjusted the price of diesel. Lanka Auto Diesel now stands at Rs. 308 per litre, reflecting a reduction of Rs. 2. On the other hand, the price of Lanka Super Diesel 4 Star Euro 4 has decreased by Rs. 12, reaching Rs. 358 per litre.
Additionally, the price of Lanka Kerosene has dropped by Rs. 10, resulting in a revised rate of Rs. 266 per litre. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
